data.name: cmbIS_STOVE_VENTED
data.value: Is the stove vented into the same chimney flue (double vented) with a heating device using a different type of fuel?

data.name: txtOTHER_DEVICES_ATTACHED
data.value: If yes, list other devices and where each is attached to the chimney

data.name: cmbIS_TILE_FLUE_LINING
data.value: If masonry: does tile fuel lining extend from below the stovepipe entry point to the top of the chimney?

data.name: cmbIS_CHIMNEY_GROUND_UP
data.value: If masonry: is the chimney built from the ground up?

data.name: cmbCHIMNEY_INST_AFTER_HOUSE_BLT
data.value: Was the chimney installed after the house was built and for this solid fuel heating device?

data.name: cmbIS_CHIMNEY_COVERED
data.value: Is chimney "covered with" or "hidden behind" a combustible wall?

data.name: txtDIST_FROM_SMOKE_PIPE
data.value: Give distance from smoke pipe to edges of opening in that wall or cover

data.name: txtTHIMBLE_OR_MATERIAL
data.value: Describe any thimble or material placed to protect the edges of that opening

data.name: cmbDOES_SMOKE_PIPE_FIT
data.value: Does the smoke pipe fit snugly into the chimney opening?

data.name: cmbSMOKE_PIPE_WASTE_HEAT
data.value: Does the smoke pipe have a "waste heat collector/circulator", "heat reclaimer", "catalytic converter", "heat extractor" or "circulating fan"?

data.name: cmbSTOVE_CONN_SECURE
data.value: Are stovepipe connections securely fastened to each other with screws at each connection?

data.name: cmbSMOKE_PIPE_PASS
data.value: Does the smoke pipe pass through any interior combustible wall, ceiling, closet or concealed are?
